title: Ep. 40: 'The Andy Greenwald Podcast' With Jonathan Tropper
description:
Jonathan Tropper, cocreator and showrunner of Cinemax's 'Banshee,' talks to Andy Greenwald about his decision to end the series and what to expect before the finale. 
 
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
